overview: MICHAEL J. Mele is responsible for all of Mformationâ€™s financial, administrative and IT functions. Prior to joining the company, he served as CFO of CPower, Inc., a venture capital backed provider of clean energy services. He was deeply involved in raising over $30 million in equity and debt capital and in the successful sale of CPower to Constellation Energy (NYSE: CEG). Before CPower, Mike served as CFO of Archive Systems Inc., a leading provider of on-demand document management services, and ASI Solutions, Inc. (NASDAQ: ASIS), an outsourcer of human capital services. Mike was instrumental in leading the IPO of ASI Solutions and its ultimate sale to Aon Corporation (NYSE: Aon). Earlier in his career, Mike held management positions with Mars Inc. and Daimler Benz. Michael became a CPA in New Jersey and holds BA and MBA degrees from Rutgers University.
